india.heading: India Consumption Story
points: India is 1.3 billion people. About 65% live in rural India.
India is a Young and Aspirational nation. High potential for Consumption of Goods & Services.
Invest in India is the new desire of Entrepreneurs & Investors.
Rising Income levels have led to huge demand for consumption of goods and services in Rural India.
Rural India is new growth engine and outperforming Urban India. In Urban India, there is competition to increase market share.
Retail businesses as well as Consumers are changing rapidly. Covid 19 has accelerated this change at a fast pace.
New Normal has emerged for businesses, especially for retail and consumer facing businesses. These changes are permanent and will keep gaining pace going forward.

idea.heading: RetailZip Idea
points: Entrepreneurs desire to create their own Retail Brand or a Retail Destination Mall.

Objective is to help Entrepreneurs to Develop, Expand and Grow their business in a most efficient and profitable manner.
